caption=Saradoc Brandybuck from ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]''

column1: Saradoc was the son of [[Rorimac Brandybuck]]. He married [[Esmeralda Took]], and had one child, [[Meriadoc Brandybuck
column2: Meriadoc]], who joined the [[Fellowship of the Ring
column3: Company of the Ring]]. With his father, wife and son, he was present at [[Bilbo's Farewell Party]].

column1: Saradoc became [[Master of Buckland]] after his father's death in {{SR
